definition: to change or replace/to experience/one of the five two-hour periods into which the night was formerly divided/watch (e.g. of a sentry or guard)
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: They decided to take the path of self-reliance.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定走自力更生的道路。

sentences.english: Doing so strengthens capacities and builds self-reliance.
sentences.chinese: 这样做可以增强能力和实现自力更生。

sentences.english: Asking for help would violate the company's self-reliant culture.
sentences.chinese: 向别人寻求帮助会违反公司自力更生的文化。

sentences.english: You can pay the money back after you find work and get on your feet again.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在找到工作能自力更生以后再把钱还我。

sentences.english: Such self-reliance is a principal value of Child rearing in middle-class America.
sentences.chinese: 这种自力更生的精神是最重要的育儿观。

sentences.english: Heaven only aided those who endeavoured to help themselves .
sentences.chinese: 老天爷只帮助那些自力更生的人。

sentences.english: Allantoin and Panthenol help heal, rebuild, and add suppleness to your skin.
sentences.chinese: 尿囊素和泛酰醇有助于治疗，更生和增添皮肤的弹性。

sentences.english: We should carry on the spirit of self-reliance.
sentences.chinese: 我们应充分发扬自力更生的精神。

sentences.english: If we do it ourselves, only cheap energy from hydropower will do.
sentences.chinese: 如果靠自力更生，只有靠水电站带来的廉价能源了。

sentences.english: Hardship and opposition are the native soil of manhood and self-reliance.
sentences.chinese: 困窘和敌对是刚毅和自立更生的天然土壤。

sentences.english: There is that idea that people should do for themselves.
sentences.chinese: 有一种观念是说人们要自力更生。

sentences.english: This is the high-five moment for bootstrapped ventures.
sentences.chinese: 这是自力更生的创业者鼓掌欢呼的时刻。

sentences.english: Now that the boy was earning his own living he could defy his father's strict rules.
sentences.chinese: 如今男孩已自立更生，他可以不受父亲的严厉管束。

sentences.english: It's a self-reliant sort of life.
sentences.chinese: 这是一种自力更生的生活。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the supply of food in China must be self-sustainable.
sentences.chinese: 而且，中国的粮食供给必须坚持自力更生。

sentences.english: It's no wonder she embraced this philosophy of self-reliance.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，她接受这套自力更生的哲学。

definition: university student, abbr. for 大學生|大学生[da4 xue2 sheng1]
to be unable (to do sth)/no reason to .../without rhyme or reason
to accumulate/to hold in store/to contain/to gather together/to collect/depth/inner strength/profundity
lit. the mountains crumble and the trees lie ruined/a great sage has died (idiom)
lit. when one grass burns the other grass sighs (idiom); fig. to have sympathy with a like-minded person in distress
lit. when one grass burns the other grass sighs (idiom); fig. to have sympathy with a like-minded person in distress
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
